titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of May 2022 as Healthy Vision Month to promote eye care, thereby helping Americans of all ages maintain healthy vision that can keep you safe and active each day.

Expressing support for the designation of May 2022 as Healthy Vision Month to promote eye care, thereby helping Americans of all ages maintain healthy vision that can keep you safe and active each day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Healthy Vision Month.
